intro: Strobocalyx celebica, commonly known as the Celebes starfruit, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes cucumbers and gourds, and is characterized by its vining growth habit. The plant produces small, yellow, star-shaped flowers that are followed by edible, acidic fruits. Its botanical features include compound leaves with three to five leaflets and a unique, segmented fruit structure that resembles a star when mature.
